channel.title: Installing Speedify on any OpenWrt capable router unofficially
channel.description:
In case SmoothWAN does not support the hardware or sources are unavailable like the new GL.iNet devices and FriendlyWrt for NanoPi/BananaPi.
Ported from SmoothWAN. Requires familiarity with OpenWrt.
Installation video for installing via web interface is provided: [TalalMash/Unofficial-Speedify-Installer-For-OpenWrt: Install & configure Speedify using LuCI (github.com)](https://github.com/TalalMash/Unofficial-Speedify-Installer-For-OpenWrt)
